    • Method Detail

      • searchCourseMessage

        public java.lang.String searchCourseMessage(java.lang.String courseName)
        Returns a query message, which is used by the client. Server Response: if course exists in database: 1. successMessage() 2. Course else: 1. error message (the client should display this on the GUI)
        Parameters:
        courseName - name of course
        Returns:
        a properly structured query message

      • addCourseToStudentMessage

        public java.lang.String addCourseToStudentMessage(java.lang.String courseName)
        Returns a query message, which is used by the client. Server Response: 1. successMessage() 2. ArrayList of courses taken by student else: 1. custom error message (client should display to GUI)
        Parameters:
        courseName - name of course
        Returns:
        a properly structured query message

      • removeCourseFromStudentMessage

        public java.lang.String removeCourseFromStudentMessage(java.lang.String courseName)
        Returns a query message, which is used by the client. Server Response: if successful: 1. successMessage() 2. ArrayList of courses taken by student else: 1. custom error message (client should display to GUI)
        Parameters:
        courseName - name of course
        Returns:
        a properly structured query message

      • listCoursesMessage

        public java.lang.String listCoursesMessage()
        Returns a query message, which is used by the client. Server Response: if successful: 1. successMessage() 2. ArrayList of courses taken by student else: 1. custom error message (client should display to GUI)
        Returns:
        a properly structured query message

      • allCoursesTakenByStudentMessage

        public java.lang.String allCoursesTakenByStudentMessage()
        Returns a query message, which is used by the client. Server Response: if successful: 1. successMessage() 2. ArrayList of courses taken by student else: 1. custom error message (client should display to GUI)
        Returns:
        a properly structured query message

      • quitMessage

        public java.lang.String quitMessage()
        Terminates connection from server to client
        Returns:
        a properly structured query message

      • successMessage

        public java.lang.String successMessage()
        After the server handles a query successfully, this message will be returned to the client
        Returns:
        a properly structured query message

      • failMessage

        public java.lang.String failMessage()
        After the server handles a query unsuccesfully, this message will be returned to the client
        Returns:
        a properly structured query message

        public java.lang.String loginMessage(java.lang.String studentName)
        Returns a query message, which is used by the client. Server Response: if successful: 1. successMessage() else: 1. custom error message (client should display to GUI)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
